H0.text: What name is given to the person in a restaurant responsible for the wine and assisting customers with their choice of wine. Vintner

H1.text: What name is given to the person in a restaurant responsible for the wine and assisting customers with their choice of wine. Wine Steward

H2.text: What name is given to the person in a restaurant responsible for the wine and assisting customers with their choice of wine. Cellar Master

H3.text: What name is given to the person in a restaurant responsible for the wine and assisting customers with their choice of wine. Somelier

A6.text: A sommelier (UK: SOM-əl-yay, som-EL-ee-ay, US: SUM-əl-YAY, French: [sɔməlje] ), chef de vin or wine steward, is a trained and knowledgeable wine professional, normally working in fine restaurants, who specializes in all aspects of wine service as well as wine and food pairing.

A7.text: A vintner is a wine merchant.

A8.text: They are generally employed by wineries or wine companies.
